meta-description: Soma na usikilize Sura {{transliteratedName}}. Sura imeteremshwa {{revelationPlace}}, kwa mpangilio wa {{chapterOrder}} ndani ya Qur'ani. Jina la Surah linamaanisha " {{translatedName}} " katika {{localeName}} na lina aya {{versesCount}}.
ranges-meta-desc: Soma na sikiliza kutoka Aya {{rangeFrom}} hadi Aya {{rangeTo}}.
